intro: Aneilema africanum, commonly known as the African aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, often reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. The flowers are small, clustered in cymes, and usually display white or pale pink hues.
